<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Angelic Halo](/Spells.aspx?ID=2093)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=542" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Holy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=517" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 262 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=20)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies' healing from the [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) spell. Allies in your halo's emanation who are healed by a _heal_ spell gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's level.
name: Angelic Halo
